titles.title: Small Business Relief From Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2019
Small Business Relief From Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to ensure small businesses affected by the onset of transmissible diseases are eligible for disaster relief.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2019
This bill allows the Small Business Administration to provide disaster loans to small business concerns affected by communicable diseases for which the federal government issues a travel alert or travel warning.
